GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.42 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
arm64: Fix match_list for erratum 1286807 on Arm Cortex-A76

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 1ed630bc530ae107d32c41156b836ee95651e33c, it was introduced in version v5.15.42 by commit 149a25b82ca991c65d989a0148c3ab5d765e5272. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: arm64: Fix match_list for erratum 1286807 on Arm Cortex-A76
